ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Jonathon's provacation
ygData.msgSnippet: The cleric I hunt with all the time couldnt believe it when i showed him my melee speed and damage with Provocation, Nivs and Absonant Binding. I got a message
ygData.messageBody:
The cleric I hunt with all the time couldnt believe it when i showed
him my melee speed and damage with Provocation, Nivs and Absonant Binding.
I got a message from him a while ago that he was working a trade for an FBSS
for me already :) The effect is so pronounced someone watching you fight
can very easily see the difference.

Basically there are times in a caster heavy group with no main tank
that we NEED to take that role for taunt and interrupt purposes. This song
lets us do that much better than previously.

Lago



> That was my first thought as well after trying Jonthan's for the first
> time:-)
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
> My only thought now is that I need to get a FBSS, hangman's noose or
> something, as I finally have a NEED for a haste item!
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
>
